== Notes ==

=== Vérifier avec portlint, formatter avec portfmt ===

=== PR ===

* Mettre le changlog dans URL
* Ne pas utiliser PORTREVISION si DISTVERSION est incrémenté (car sert aux patches freebsd)
* Cocher &quot;maintainer approval&quot; dans le patch (et pas maintainer-feedback !)

=== Haskell ===

* Tutorial:

https://docs.freebsd.org/en/books/porters-handbook/special/#using-cabal

* &quot;when updating from something like 1.5.0.0 to 1.5.0.1 it is usually sufficient to just bump the PORTVERSION. No need to refresh the whole USE<sub>CABAL</sub> in this case.&quot;
* 11.4 and 12.2 are enough (no need for aarch64)

<ol style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><p>Git-annex</p>
<p>&quot;When updating such ports I do this:</p>
<ul>
<li>Run make config and turn all options OFF.</li>
<li>Regenerate common USE<sub>CABAL</sub>.</li>
<li>See if things build.</li>
<li>Then start enabling options one by one and adjust optionalized dependencies until it builds.</li></ul>

<p>So yes, hs-git-annex is quite cumbersome port in this regard.&quot;</p></li></ol>

<p>En enlevant ceux qui sont nul (amount = 0) &quot;1009437&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;Ingredients&quot;,&quot;3&quot; &quot;13706914&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;204&quot;,&quot;93.33&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706916&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;208&quot;,&quot;867&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706914&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;204&quot;,&quot;93.33&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706916&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;208&quot;,&quot;867&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;</p>
<p>En enlevant ceux qui sont redondant, on retrouve 5 (différents des 3 mentionnés ??) food<sub>nutrients</sub>.csv &quot;13706914&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;204&quot;,&quot;93.33&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706916&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;208&quot;,&quot;867&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706928&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;606&quot;,&quot;13.33&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706929&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;645&quot;,&quot;20&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot; &quot;13706930&quot;,&quot;1105904&quot;,&quot;646&quot;,&quot;53.33&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;71&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;,&quot;&quot;</p>
<p>Les codes ne correspondent pas à nutrient.csv ou nutrient<sub>incomingname</sub>. mais d'après le site https://fdc.nal.usda.gov/fdc-app.html#/food-details/1455596/nutrients (au passage, l'ID est encore différent) :</p>
<ul>
<li>204 = lipid</li>
<li>208 = énergie</li>
<li>606 = fat total saturated</li>
<li>645 = fat total monounsaturated</li>
<li>646 = fat total polyunsaturated</li></ul>

<p>En fait, le code est donné par nutrient<sub>nbr</sub> dans nutrients.csv (!)</p></li>
<li><p>En résumé</p>
<p>Requirements : food.csv, nutrient.csv, food<sub>nutrients</sub>.csv</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<li>Chercher l'ID dans food.csv (nom = description, id = fdc<sub>id</sub>)</li>
<li>Pour fdc<sub>id</sub>, obtenir la liste des nutriments (nutrient<sub>id</sub>) avec leurs valeurs (amonut) dans food<sub>nutrients</sub>.csv</li>
<li>Convertir l'Id nutrient (nutrient<sub>nbr</sub> = nutrient<sub>id</sub>) en son nom (nutrient<sub>nbr</sub>)avec nutrient.csv</li></ol>
</li></ol>
